title: Correction: Nucleic acid purification from plants, animals and microbes in under 30 seconds
fullText: The Competing interests statement for this paper is incorrect. The correct statement is: The research generated in this manuscript was used to file a provisional patent application in Australia to protect any possible intellectual property arising from this work. Provisional patent application number: 2017901487. Title: SIMPLE DNA EXTRACTION. Applicant: The University of Queensland. Filing date: April 24, 2017. The authors have not licensed or sold their technology to any company and it is not being commercialized by them.
